Firm.filter: where Active != 'N' or Active is null

Account.filter: where mm_firm_acct_active != 'N' or mm_firm_acct_active is null

Desk.filter: where Active != 'N' or Active is null

Trader.filter: where mm_user_status != 'N' or mm_user_status is null

mm_user_login.title: ID
mm_user_login.errorMsg: First letter of ID should be Alphabet & rest Alpha-Numeric

mm_user_password.title: Password
mm_user_password.errorMsg: Password should be between 8 and 12 characters and it should have atleast an uppercase, a lowercase, a digit and a special character (@,#,$,%,&,*,/)

User Entitlements.filter: where ( isActive != 'N' or isActive is null )

user_permission_name.title: Permission
user_permission_name.query: select perm_name from ft_oms_permissions where perm_group = 'SysConfig' or perm_group = 'User'

constraint.errMsg: Permission Type must be Yes/No if Permission is Client Ref Required.
Permission Type must be Yes/No if Permission is Override Pre-deal Check.

mm_acces_acct_id.title: Account
mm_acces_acct_id.query: select mm_firm_acct_internal_id, mm_firm_acct_subacct, mm_firm_acct_group from ft_mm_firm_account

AutoRouting.filter: where Active != 'N' or Active is null

Customer.filter: where mm_acct_active  != 'N' or mm_acct_active is null

constraint.errMsg: MPID is required When Member Type is Member

mm_member_type_code.title: Member Type
values: Domestic Financial Institutions (Other than Banks & Insurance)
Qualified foreign investors Groups or Associations (QFI G/A)

translation.g: Domestic Financial Institutions (Other than Banks & Insurance)
translation.q: Qualified foreign investors Groups or Associations (QFI G/A)

constraint.errMsg: SalesTrader value is required when IsCoverd=Y
SalesAcct value is required when IsCoverd=Y

PAN_Number.title: Pan Number
PAN_Number.errorMsg: Characters: 1-5 should be Alphabets, 6-9 should be Numbers, 10th character as Alphabet

SubAcct.title: SubAcct
SubAcct.query: select mm_acct_id from ft_mm_account where mm_acct_name = '%s'

Security.filter: where ( mm_comm_active != 'N' or mm_comm_active is null )

ShortLocate.filter: where locate_active != 'N' or locate_active is null

constraint.errMsg: Bid Minimum <= Bid Maximum
Bid Minimum <= Bid Offset
Ask Minimum <= Ask Offset
Ask Minimum <= Ask Maximum
VariableRate must be N if Type is CPS/BPS/FLAT/PERCENT.
VariableRate must be Y if Type is VALUE_BASED/SHARES_BASED/AVG_PRICE_BASED.

ccharge_sub_acct.title: SubAcct
ccharge_sub_acct.query: select mm_acct_id from ft_mm_account where mm_acct_name = '%s'

constraint.errMsg: Conditional value should be blank if conditional attribute is MIN_CHARGE
Conditional value should be BUY/SELL if conditional attribute is BUYSELL
Conditional value should be LESS/MORE if conditional attribute is ONLY_IF
Conditional value should be blank if conditional attribute is SYMBOL_EQUALS
VariableRate must be N if Type is CPS/BPS/FLAT/PERCENT.
VariableRate must be Y if Type is VALUE_BASED/SHARES_BASED/AVG_PRICE_BASED.
Conditional value should be blank if conditional attribute is MIN_CHARGE
Conditional value should be BUY/SELL if conditional attribute is BUYSELL
Conditional value should be BUY/SELL if conditional attribute is ONLY_IF
Conditional value should be blank if conditional attribute is SYMBOL_EQUALS
VariableRate must be N if Type is CPS/BPS/FLAT/PERCENT.
VariableRate must be Y if Type is VALUE_BASED/SHARES_BASED/AVG_PRICE_BASED.
ConfigType should be ENV and Category should be one of [AppEnv|CommonEnv]

Broker.filter: where ft_brk_active != 'N' or ft_brk_active is null

BusinessTagsDesc.filter: where Active != 'N' or Active is null

CustName.title: CustName
CustName.query: select distinct(CustId), mm_institution_name from ft_mm_oasyscrossref, ft_mm_cust_ioi_config where mm_acct_name='%s'

mm_exch_calendarname.title: Holidays
mm_exch_calendarname.query: select distinct(mm_holiday_exch_code) as calenderName from ft_mm_holidays

Group Entitlements.filter: where user_id like '%.%' and user_id not like '%.%.%' and ( isActive != 'N' or isActive is null )

user_permission_name.title: Permission
user_permission_name.query: select perm_name from ft_oms_permissions where perm_group = 'SysConfig' or perm_group = 'User'

constraint.errMsg: Permission Type must be Yes/No if Permission is Client Ref Required.

Min Price.title: Min Price
Min Price.query: if exists (select 1 from ft_mm_quote_size where market = '%s') select max(priceRHS) as FromPrice from ft_mm_quote_size where market = '%s' else select '0.0000' as FromPrice

constraint.errMsg: Max Price > Min Price
Tag Number >= 1
Tag Number <= 1000
